title: [BaseConverter] Added layout sketch with empty callbacks
message:
[BaseConverter] Added layout sketch with empty callbacks

The base converter layout has been sketched with a minimalistic
approach.

As for the Activity object, the empty callbacks have been put in place
and connected with the layout file.

title: Added base files for the BaseConverter activity
message:
Added base files for the BaseConverter activity

These are the required files to provide the base converter activity.
Navigation is already connected throught the MainWindow class and the
manifest. The class is, however, an empty placeholder to be filled in.

AndroidManifest.xml:
    Added the activity tag for this class

res/layout/base_converter:
    created empty placeholder

res/layout/main.xml:
    added the button and the callback to push the new activity

res/values/strings.xml:
    Added the constant to show in the status bar for the new activity

src/gidaibero/android/matsol/BaseConverterActivity.java:
    Added base class

src/gidaibero/android/matsol/MainWindow.java:
    Added the connecting code.

title: Added the rescalc sources back
message:
Added the rescalc sources back
Since version 1.0(now 1.1) didnt have rescalc around, the sources were
deleted to have them outside of the tarball. Since the new version will
contain such functionality, I will add the sources back.
